name: etherscan-api
description: API to etherscan with a simple interface

scripts.bundle: browserify index.js -s etherscanApi -o dist/bundle.js && git commit ./dist -m bundle && git push
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run changelog
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run pages
scripts.changelog: rm ./docs/CHANGELOG.md && changelog https://github.com/sebs/etherscan-api all > ./docs/CHANGELOG.md && git add . && git commit . -m changelog
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run docs
